description: System-generated primary key for this address type record; unique identifier used for joins and referential integrity.
Business code or short name for the address type (e.g., Home, Business, Shipping, Billing); expected to be unique.
Human-readable description of the address type; may duplicate the code value in some implementations; confirm with SME.
Optional free-text notes about the address type, such as usage guidance, distinctions, or internal remarks.
System timestamp of the most recent update to this record, regardless of actor.
Timestamp when a user, rather than an automated job, last modified this record; likely a legacy audit field; confirm with SME.
Identifier of the user or service account that created the record (e.g., login name or employee ID).
Timestamp when the record was initially created.
Identifier of the user or service account that most recently updated the record.
Timestamp when the record was last updated by a user or process.
